title: Augmented Reality (AR)-Based Short-Intensive Course for Enhancing Clinical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical skills training for corporate medical device administrators/leaders, applying AR technology via BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) and emphasizing field-oriented learning

learning_goals: Learners can perform three core clinical skills (e.g., intravenous injection, wound care, blood pressure measurement) with 90% accuracy through AR simulation
Learners can establish and implement a self-directed review plan utilizing AR content
Learners can propose at least two methods for applying AR technology to field tasks (e.g., point-of-care diagnostic support)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
